recommendations.title: About Flash Chat
recommendations.intro: Welcome to FlashChat. This tool is designed to facilitate quick and secure communication. Here are some guidelines to get the most out of it.

advantages.title: Main Advantages
advantages.speedContent: Instant communication thanks to technology used by major platforms.
advantages.privacyContent: No permanent history is saved and messages are deleted when closing or refreshing the page.
advantages.noLogsContent: Forget emails or account creation. No cloud storage.

usage.title: Recommended Use
usage.ephemeralContent: Ideal for quick chats that require no history.
usage.privateDataContent: Processed in real-time, leaving no exposed info.

security.title: Guidelines & Security
security.passwords: Do not share passwords or sensitive financial information.
security.reload: Remember that if you reload the page, you might lose the local message history.
security.respect: Be respectful to other participants in the room.
